name: v4.2.0
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "build_stack_rules_proto", version = "v4.2.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Remove repo self-references by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/406
* Update golang dep labels for go_naming_convention "import" by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/412
* Migrate importpaths to use v4 by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/413
* Upgrade to rules_go 0.59.0 for bazelci by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/414


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v4.1.2...v4.2.0

name: v4.1.2
body:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "build_stack_rules_proto", version = "v4.1.2")
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v4.1.1...v4.1.2

name: v4.1.1
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "build_stack_rules_proto", version = "v4.1.1")
```


## What's Changed
* Add example of ts-proto vendored assets by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/398
* minor change: Update BCR link by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/399
* minor: tidy Makefile by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/400
* Fix label references when consumed as a library by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/403
* MODULE.bazel: mark module version using placeholder 0.0.0 by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/404


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v4.1.0...v4.1.1

name: v4.1.0
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "build_stack_rules_proto", version = "v4.1.0")
```


## What's Changed
* BCR presubmit changes by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/394
* go: upgrade deps in go.mod by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/395
* node: upgrade npm deps by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/397


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v4.0.0...v4.1.0

name: v4.0.0
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "build_stack_rules_proto", version = "v4.0.0")
```


## What's Changed
* python: Provide python rules via CrossResolve. by @DolceTriade in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/316
* Fix failing `grpc_test` by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/366
* Fix proto_compiled_sources with strip_import_prefix by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/365
* Add stackb:rules_proto:grpc_zio_scala_library by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/350
* Advertise Zio symbols if the label includes "zio" by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/385
* Migrate to Bzlmod (v3) by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/389
* Update docs for 4.x.x by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/390
* bazelrc: remove blake3 digest function by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/391
* proto_compile: remove use of ctx.resolve_tools by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/393

## New Contributors
* @DolceTriade made their first contribution in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/316

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v3.2.0...v4.0.0

name: v3.2.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_stack_rules_proto",
    sha256 = "b7cbaf457d91e1d3c295df53b80f24e1d6da71c94ee61c42277ab938db6d1c68",
    strip_prefix = "rules_proto-3.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/archive/refs/tags/v3.2.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update README for v3.1.0 by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/360
* Update the strip prefix logic for python libraries by @vihangm in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/361
* cc_library support resolve directive by @gou4shi1 in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/303
* Fix generated url for github_proto_repository macro by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/331
* fix: don't depend on JAVA_HOME by @alexeagle in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/341
* feat: introduce bufbuild/connect-es by @alexeagle in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/338

## New Contributors
* @gou4shi1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/303
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/341

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v3.1.0...v3.2.0



## What's Changed
* Update README for v3 by @pcj in https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/pull/359

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stackb/rules_proto/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

name: v2.0.1
body: Previously, upgrading was a matter of pushing the commit to latest master.  This release marks beginning of releases for the v2 edition.
